issue.title: Pricing : total DB type needs to be DECIMAL(19,2) as for config values
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Pricing : total DB type needs to be DECIMAL(19,2) as for config values to allow consistent totals and avoid floating points behaviors. 
Following : Defect #1050 : SHOP Pricing does not support "large" amounts.


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
